snippet.title: Panga's Kaizo Kindergarten (For Dummies) // First Playthrough (No Commentary)
snippet.description:
Hack: Panga's Kaizo Kindergarten (For Dummies)
Creator: PangaeaPanga
Download Link: https://www.smwcentral.net/?p=section&a=details&id=20091

This was streamed live on Twitch:
https://www.twitch.tv/protopizza

Made a mistake with the timer, where I accidentally lost  3:12:38.04. So the adjusted total should be 18:50:57.06. There's no sound effects since I replaced all of the audio manually, since the original stream audio wasn't useable.

Timestamps:
00:00 Start
00:19 Welcome!
00:42 Jump Heights
01:58 P-Meter
03:29 Slopes and Momentum
05:12 Spawn Mechanics
07:19 Frame Rules and Timers
09:50 Re-Grabs
11:11 Jump Heights - The Low Bounce
11:58 Jump Heights - The High Bounce
12:38 Assessment *1
13:40 Left-Rights
15:04 Mid-Air Movement
15:56 Mid-Air Movement on Moving Enemies
16:54 Switching Between Jump Types
18:03 Predicting Enemy Movement
19:10 Landing on Falling Enemies
20:08 Assessment *2
21:30 Carrying Items While Spin-Jumping
23:02 Juggling Items
24:35 Vine Mechanics
25:35 Assessment *3
26:45 Shell-Jumps
28:25 The Double Shell-Jump
29:33 Item Jumps & One-Frame Tricks
31:31 Stun Timer Resets
32:33 Yoshi Mechanics
35:04 Assessment *4
36:34 Movement-Influenced Enemies
38:12 The Disco Shell
39:32 The Fishin' Boo
40:59 Assessment *5
42:20 Spin Flight
43:31 Normal Flight
46:32 Swimming Mechanics
48:39 The Final Exam monkaS
51:59 Credits

#kaizo #mario
